Articles.Content:
so i dont really play KSP, but its clone SimpleRockets 2. i really dont know if i should show my builds here from a game that is a clone of here

dont want to start a controversy but i still wanna open up

There's nothing stopping you from sharing your love of a game that you enjoy.   We do already have some threads already on the game (to call it a clone of KSP is quite a stretch though).  That said, this is the official forums for KSP, run and owned by the  publishers involved, so it's up to you how you want to handle it.
